product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Spring Lake Sleeping Bag - Special Buy
long_description: With synthetic insulation, the ALPS Mountaineering Spring Lake 45 Sleeping Bag has the right amount of warmth for warm-weather camping. TechLoft+ polyester insulation, made with hollow-core fibers, provides high loft and cozy warmth. 2-layer offset construction eliminates cold spots. Rated to keep you warm down to about 45degF for warm-weather car camping. Features soft polyester/cotton lining; ripstop nylon shell offers durability for years of use. Full-length draft tube keeps warm air in and cold air out; full-length zipper allows you to zip multiple bags together. ALPS Mountaineering Spring Lake 45 Sleeping Bag comes with a stuff sack. Special buy.
short_description: With synthetic insulation, the ALPS Mountaineering Spring Lake 45 Sleeping Bag has the right amount of warmth for warm-weather camping.
